com.facebook.react.uimanager

类 ThemedReactContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • com.facebook.react.bridge.ReactContext
          • com.facebook.react.uimanager.ThemedReactContext

  • public class ThemedReactContext
extends ReactContext
    Wraps ReactContext with the base Context passed into the constructor. It provides also a way to start activities using the viewContext to which RN native views belong. It delegates lifecycle listener registration to the original instance of ReactContext which is supposed to receive the lifecycle events. At the same time we disallow receiving lifecycle events for this wrapper instances. TODO: T7538544 Rename ThemedReactContext to be in alignment with name of ReactApplicationContext

      • getCurrentActivity

        public android.app.Activity getCurrentActivity()
        从类复制的说明: ReactContext
        Get the activity to which this context is currently attached, or null if not attached. DO NOT HOLD LONG-LIVED REFERENCES TO THE OBJECT RETURNED BY THIS METHOD, AS THIS WILL CAUSE MEMORY LEAKS.
        覆盖:
        getCurrentActivity 在类中 ReactContext

      • getSurfaceID

        public java.lang.String getSurfaceID()
        返回:
        a String that represents the ID of the js application that is being rendered with this ThemedReactContext
